room_title: Escape room "Wanted: Dead or Alive?" by Back in Time Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
room_description:
On July 14, 1881, Billy the Kid was supposedly killed by Sheriff Pat Garrett in New Mexico and was quickly buried. The New Mexico legislature unanimously agreed to grant the then substantial bounty of $500 to Sheriff Garrett. However, it was rumored that Sheriff Garrett was, in fact, a friend of Billy the Kid and staged his death out of friendship so that the gunman could evade the law.
So what really happened? Do you and your team have what it takes to unravel the mystery behind Billy's death?
